definition: shouting abuse in the street like a fishwife

definition: lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
lit. Lord Ye's passion for dragons (idiom)/fig. to pretend to be fond of sth while actually fearing it/ostensible fondness of sth one really fears
lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
to whisper to one another's ear
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
lit. neither a relative nor a friend (idiom)/fig. unrelated to one another in any way
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
